duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome and create the first impression upon guest arrival.
Assist passengers during loading and unloading process.
Relocate guest automobiles to designated parking locations.
Coordinate with hotel guest services and have knowledge of daily events.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license and clean driving record.
Prior related customer service experience preferred.
Stamina to lift moderate weights and run short distances.
Comfortable working outdoors in various weather conditions.
Open and flexible schedule including morning, afternoon, evening, weekend, and holiday shifts.
